mapper.sql: cyw.id as cyw_id, cyw.year as cyw_year, cyw.worker_id as cyw_worker_id, cyw.company_code as cyw_company_code, cyw.current_job as cyw_current_job, cyw.create_time as cyw_create_time, cyw.update_time as cyw_update_time, cyw.is_active as cyw_is_active, cyw.user_id as cyw_user_id
mapper.insert: insert into company_year_worker (year, worker_id, company_code, current_job, create_time, update_time, is_active, user_id ) values (#{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{workerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(),now(),default,#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into company_year_worker
year,
worker_id,
company_code,
current_job,
create_time, update_time,
is_active,
user_id,

mapper.update:
update company_year_worker
worker_id = #{workerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_job = #{currentJob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
